Abstract: Entrepreneurs and business executives are nation's heroes at dawn of 21st century, but it is uncertain whether they can retain that status for long; photo; cartoon (S)
Snippet: Entrepreneurs and business executives are nation's heroes at dawn of 21st century, but it is uncertain whether they can retain that status for long; photo; cartoon (S)
LeadParagraph: WHEN Fortune magazine was introduced in February 1930, its premise, according to one historian, was ''that the great businessmen were the new supermen of civilization.'' Almost 70 years later, the rest of America is coming around to Fortune's way of thinking.

Headline.PrintHeadline: VISIONS: CITIES; Will Entrepreneurs Still Be Heroes?
